fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Electrocute 2 people at night.
- With the Necronomicon, strike thunder on a player's house, killing them and electrocuting all visitors. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Electrocutions are permanent unless removed by something that removes negative effects.
- If two electrocuted players visit the same target, or one visits the other, they both get indirectly attacked.
- No mistakes were made in this role.
